item.title: What Stock Indexes Teach Us
item.description: This text explores why it has been challenging to beat indexes like the S&P 500 over long time horizons and how we can use this information to build a momentum trading strategy. It also discusses the similarities between trading and poker. Overall, the goal of this text is to introduce momentum trading, which will be explored further in another post.
